sentences: On 30 November, the SBI took up agenda items on capacity building under the Convention (FCCC/CP/2010/5 and Add.1, FCCC/CP/2009/9, FCCC/SBI/2010/20 and MISC.6, FCCC/SBI/2009/10, MISCs.1, 2, 8, and 12/Rev.1) and under the Kyoto Protocol (FCCC/KP/CMP/2010/10, FCCC/KP/CMP/2009/16, FCCC/SBI/2010/20 and MISC.6, FCCC/SBI/2009/4, 5, 10, MISCs.1, 2, 8 and 12/Rev.1).
Capacity building was further considered in a contact group co-chaired by Philip Gwage (Uganda) and Marie Jaudet (France).
The main area of discussion was whether to recommend text asking the GEF to increase financial support.
While the G-77/China supported this text, the EU, US and Japan preferred asking the GEF simply to continue providing financial support.
Parties were unable to agree on this and decided to return to the issue at SBI 34.
The SBI adopted short conclusions on this on 4 December, and the COP and COP/MOP adopted short decisions on 10 December.
